title: Apple tarte tatin
ingredients: ['Apple topping', '4 large apples (about 1 kg)', '25g butter', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '125g soft brown sugar', 'Tart', '85g butter', '140g plain flour', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'pinch of salt', '150g caster sugar', '50g soft brown sugar', '2 eggs', '125g soured cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence']
